actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate duplication in the certification process for institutions and eligible courses under the Veterans and War Orphans' and Widows' Education Assistance provisions of this title.

summary.text: Authorizes the substitution of flight school certification by the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration for that presently required of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs in the approval of flight training courses for purposes of veterans' educational benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate duplication in the certification process for institutions and eligible courses under the Veterans and War Orphans' and Widows' Education Assistance provisions of this title.
